derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a noun): perhaps an alteration of Scots and northern English crag 'neck'. The verb (mid 18th cent.) developed the sense 'handle roughly' from the early use 'hang, strangle'

means.word_mean: 2. the lean end of a neck of veal
